info.name: Contact API
info.description:
**Simple Contact List API**

Made with <3 by [zxyvyx](https://github.com/zxyvyx)

response.name: 400: Bad request
200: Successfully get current logged in user data
200: Success search with params
200: Success search with empty result

variable.description: is Required with number regex validation [0-9]

response.name: 404: Can get contact by other user
200: Success get all address by contact
404: Failed get all address of unidentified contact
400: Bad request create address of contact
200: Success get detail by id contact and id address
200: Success delete address by id contact and id address
